product_name: Salomon XA Midlayer Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Salomon XA Midlayer top regulates your body temperature so well that you just might forget you're wearing it. Soft, stretch-woven fleece interior wicks moisture and dries quickly; stretchy polyester exterior offers a smooth texture. Underarm stretch panels promote breathability and allow full range of motion. A full-length zipper provides immediate ventilation and easy on/off; discreet chest pocket stores small essentials. Reflective logo on front and back increases visibility in low light. Salomon XA Midlayer top features an active fit that skims the body without being too tight. Closeout.
